xhtml.body:
Release notes
Version 1.9.8 Added 'wait' event triggers to every dial sequence in order to get over the problem where we can't hangup and the connection status fails to update. As far as I can see the fail to hangup is caused by the wait events stopping. The logic of this change is to always restart waitevents.
If you have feature requests or installation/configuration problems post them at http://forums.noojee.com.au
